text: Carlos Henrique Casimiro (born 23 February 1992), commonly known as Casemiro, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for English club Manchester United. He also plays for the Brazil national football team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League State league National cup League cup
